Translations.Text: Tabe ki se jane na yakhana kabaraguloya ya ache ta tola habe
ebam antare ya ache ta prakasa kara habe
nihsandeha tadera prabhu se'idina tadera sanbandhe sabisese abahita thakabena.
Mahasankata
ki se mahasankata
haya, kibhabe tomake bojhano yabe se'i mahasankata ki
se'idina manusara habe biksipta pangapalera mato
ara paharagulo haye yabe dhona pasamera mato.
Sutaram tara ksetre yara palla bhari habe
se to takhana habe santosajanaka jibanayapane.
Kinta tara ksetre yara palla habe halka
tara mata habe habiyah‌.
Haya, ki kare tomake bojhano yabe ki se'i
jbalanta aguna.
Pracuryera pratiyogita tomadera matibhrama ghataya
yataksana na tomara kabare aso.
Na! Sighra'i tomara janate parabe
abara bali, -- na, sighra'i tomara janate parabe
na, yadi tomara janate niscita jnane
tomara to bhayankara aguna dekhabe'i.
Abara bali, tomara abasya'i eti dekhabe niscita drstite.
Erapara se'idina tomadera abasya'i jijnasa kara habe abadana samparke.
Bhabo bikalabelara katha.
Nihsandeha manusa alabat lokasane pareche
tara byatita yara imana eneche o satkaja karache, ara parasparake satya abalanbanera jan'ya mantrana dicche, ebam parasparake adhyabasaya abalanbanera paramarsa dicche.
Dhik pratyeka nindakari kutsaratanakarira prati
ye dhanasampada jama karache ebam ta gunache
se bhabache ye tara dhanasampatti take amara karabe.
Kakhano na! Take abasya'i niksepa kara habe sarbanasa durghatanaya.
Ara kise tomake bojhano yabe se'i hutamah ki
ta allah‌ra hutasana, prajjbalita rayeche
ya udita hayeche hrdayera upare.
Nihsandeha eti hacche tadera carapase eka bera
sarisari khutiram bhetare.
Tumi ki dekho ni tomara prabhu kemana karechilena hasti-bahinira prati
tadera cakranta tini ki byarthataya paryabasita karena ni
ara tadera upare tini pathalena jhamke jhamke pakhira dala
yara tadera achare chila sakta-kathina patharera gaye
phale tini tadera baniye dilena kheye phela kharera mato.
Kura'isadera nirapattara jan'ya
sitakalina o grikalina bidesayatraya tadera nirapattara jan'ya.
Ata'eba tara e'i grhera prabhura upasana karuka
yini ksudhaya tadera ahara diyechena, ara bhaya-bhiti theke tadera nirapada rekhechena.
Tumi ki take dekhecha ye dharmakarmake pratyakhana kare
se to ai jana ye etimadera hamkiye deya
ara gariba-duhkhike kha'oyanora ksetre utsaha dekhaya na.
Ata'eba dhik se'isaba namaya-paruyadera prati
yara sbayam tadera namaya sanbandhe udasina
yara nijera'i hacche loka-dekhiye
ara yara nisedha kare sahayya-sahayatakarana.
Nihsandeha amara tomake pracurya diyechi.
Sutaram tomara prabhura uddesye namaya adaya karo ebam kurabani karo.
Tomara bidbesakari'i to sbayam bancita.
Balo -- ''ohe abisbasigosthi
ami take upasana kari na yake tomara upasana kara
Ara tomara'o tamra upasanakari na'o yamke ami upasana kari.
Ara ami'o tara upasanakari na'i yake tomara upasana kara.
Ara tomara'o tamra upasanakari na'o yamke ami upasana kari.
Tomadera jan'ya tomadera dharmamata ebam amara jan'ya amara dharmamata.’’
Yakhana allah‌ra sahayya o bijaya asache
ara lokedera dale-dale allah‌ra dharme prabesa karate dekhate paccha
takhana tomara prabhura prasansaya japatapa karo o tamra paritrana khomjo. Nihsandeha tini barabara pratyabartanakari.
Dhbansa hoka abu lahabera ubhaya hata, ara se-o dhbansa hoka
tara dhana-sampada o ya se arjana kareche ta tara kono kaje asabe na.
Take acire'i thele de'oya habe lelihana agune
ara tara strike'o, -- indhana bahanakarini
tara galaya thakabe karapakera khejurera amsera rasi.
Tumi balo -- ''tini allah‌, ekaka-adbitiya
allah -- parama nirbharasthala.
Tini janma dena na, ebam janma nena'o ni
ebam ke'u'i tamra samatulya hate pare na.’’
Tumi balo -- ''ami asraya ca'ichi nisibhorera prabhura kache
tini ya srsti karechena tara anista theke
ara andhakarera anista theke yakhana ta acchanna kare phele
ara gamthanite phutkarinidera anista theke
ara hinsakarira anista theke yakhana se hinsa kare.’’
Tumi bale ya'o -- ''ami asraya ca'ichi manusera prabhura kache
manusera malikera
manusera upasyera
gopane anagonakarira kumantranara anista theke
ye manusera bukera bhetare kumantrana deya
jinera athaba manusera madhye theke.’’
